methods: void addObserver(Observer observer) Adds the specified observer to the list of observers.
int countObservers() Returns the number of observers registered to this Observable.
synchronized void deleteObserver(Observer observer) Removes the specified observer from the list of observers.
synchronized void deleteObservers() Removes all observers from the list of observers.
boolean hasChanged() Returns the changed flag for this Observable.
void notifyObservers() If hasChanged() returns true, calls the update() method for every observer in the list of observers using null as the argument.
void notifyObservers(Object data) If hasChanged() returns true, calls the update() method for every Observer in the list of observers using the specified argument.
void clearChanged() Clears the changed flag for this Observable.
void setChanged() Sets the changed flag for this Observable.
